name: exlimddvfi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4

stmt.origin: exlimddvf(s1, w0, w1, w2, wsb(s1, s0, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wa(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wa(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w2)

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)), wex(s0, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wb(wex(s0, w3), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wa(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wb(wex(s0, w3), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w3), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)))
-| wnf(s1, w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wa(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s1, w3)

stmt.origin: sylanb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1, w2, w4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1), w2)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w4)
-| wi(wa(w4, w1), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wnf(s1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s1, w3)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w4)
-| wi(wa(w4, w1), w2)

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w4, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w4)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3), w4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wnf(s1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s1, w3)
-| wi(wa(w4, w1), w2)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3), w4)

body.origin: |- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wnf(s1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
-| wnf(s1, w3)
-| wi(wa(w4, w1), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3), w4)

comment: A lemma for eliminating an existential quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
